title: Think Disease.
review:
***Spoilers***
To avoid giving too much spoilers, I'll simply say this:  I thought this was a wonderful movie, even though the scares were cheap.  I think some of you are completely missing the point.  Think 'Everyone must suffer.'  Think 'She never sleeps.'  Think 'You know you don't like to hurt people / But I do..' Think Disease. Think cancer. Think cells. Think copying. Relate Samara with disease.You'll get it.
